Description: Calcite seated male figure upon red painted limestone plinth with steps and representation of altar at front.
Curator's comments: Published: PM V: p. 97. Sacred Food, Barcelona 2001, p. 202 [86]. Holzl, R, HAB: Agyptische Opfertafeln und Kultbecken, p.56,122 pl. 6.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2001 30 Jun-30 Sep, Barcelona, Sacred Food
